briefdescription.para: get pointer to qos control bytes

simplesect.para: The qos ctrl bytes come after the frame_control, duration, seq_num and 3 or 4 addresses of length ETH_ALEN. 3 addr: 2 + 2 + 2 + 3*6 = 24 4 addr: 2 + 2 + 2 + 4*6 = 30

Given an 802.11 frame, this function returns the offset to the source address (SA). It does not verify that the header is long enough to contain the address, and the header must be long enough to contain the frame control field.

Given an 802.11 frame, this function returns the offset to the destination address (DA). It does not verify that the header is long enough to contain the address, and the header must be long enough to contain the frame control field.

briefdescription.para: check if frame is a robust management frame

parameterdescription.para: the frame (buffer must include at least the first octet of payload)

simplesect.para: Convert IEEE802.11 FHSS channel to frequency (MHz) Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 14.6
Convert frequency (MHz) to IEEE802.11 FHSS channel Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 14.6
Convert IEEE802.11 DSSS channel to the center frequency (MHz). Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 15.6
Convert frequency (MHz) to IEEE802.11 DSSS channel Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 15.6 This routine selects the channel with the closest center frequency.
Convert IEEE802.11 OFDM channel to center frequency (MHz) Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 17.3.8.3.2
Convert frequency (MHz) to IEEE802.11 OFDM channel Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 17.3.8.3.2 This routine selects the channel with the closest center frequency.

briefdescription.para: check if AID bit is set in TIM

parameterdescription.para: AID bit not is set in TIM
AID bit is set im TIM

detaileddescription.para: Convert IEEE802.11 HR DSSS channel to frequency (MHz). Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 18.4.6.2. The channels and frequencies are the same as those defined for DSSS.
Convert IEEE802.11 frequency (MHz) to HR DSSS channel. Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 18.4.6.2. The channels and frequencies are the same as those defined for DSSS.
Convert IEEE802.11 ERP channel to frequency (MHz). Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 19.4.2
Convert IEEE802.11 frequency (MHz) to ERP channel. Ref IEEE 802.11-2007 section 19.4.2
